channel.title: Mac Client
channel.description:
Hello, I am working on my rsps and I decided to make it online for friends to test.
I got the porting and all that working, my friends on windows PCs can use the client but whenever one of my friends who has a mac tries to open the client he just gets a grey screen.
I redirected the cache to work for macs aswell and when I run the client through the terminal it shows the cache loading the same way as windows but when the cache is done loading the client stays on a grey screen.
If anyone has any advice to help me fix this problem that would be amazing.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Mac Client
item.dc:creator: @doleo123 doleo123
